name: In Spaaace!
description:
In this stellar space adventure, an astronaut has to make his way through the craziness of space using fire extinguishers to collect the tools he needs to repair his spaceship. Watch out for lasers and other obstacles on the way! 

Producer + 2D Art: Alex Figueroa

Level Designer: Ryan Stovall

Programmer: Bryce Halpern

2D Artist: Jae Lehman
